Judul: Giant radio telescope scaled back to contain costs: Changes may affect the Square Kilometre Array���s ability to observe the early Universe
Abstrak: Designs for the world’s largest radio telescope have been downgraded to save money — a decision that astronomers say could affect the instrument’s ability to peer deep into the Universe’s past.
